alert.note: Alert for East Polk; Mahnomen; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 2:50AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Polk, southwestern Beltrami, northeastern Mahnomen and Clearwater Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 249 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northern White Earth Nation, or 33 miles west of Bemidji, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fosston, Bagley, Clearbrook, Island Lake in Mahnomen County, Gonvick, Shevlin and Rice Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Polk; Mahnomen; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater
